CrfTemplates.name: 提供模板的名称，该名称将在应用程序的不同部分显示（必填字段）。
CrfTemplates.oid: 在应用程序中指定一个“对象标识符”作为唯一 ID。由于我们定义的是模板，它可以以 T.XXX 开头。这不是 ODM 元素，但我们在此使用它来将表单、项目组和项目分组，以便在研究级别重复使用（必填字段，可留空自动生成）。
CrfTemplates.effective_date: 提供此模板适用的生效开始日期（在日期选择器中选择日期）。
CrfTemplates.retired_date: 提供此模板停用的结束日期（退役日期），即模板将被弃用的时间（在日期选择器中选择日期）。

CRFForms.name: 提供表单的名称。这将作为 ODM-XML 文件中 /ODM/FormDef/@name 属性（必填字段）。
CRFForms.oid: 在应用程序中指定一个“对象标识符”作为唯一 ID。由于我们定义的是表单，它可以以 F.XXX 开头。这将用作 ODM-XML 文件中的 /ODM/FormDef/@OID 属性（必填字段，可留空自动生成）。
CRFForms.repeating: 指定表单是否随时间重复。这将作为 /ODM/FormDef/@Repeating 属性，以是/否作答。
CRFForms.description: 对所含研究元数据组件的自由文本描述。此信息将作为 /ODM/FormDef/Description/TranslatedText 使用。
CRFForms.impl_notes: 在此提供说明该表单在应用程序中如何使用的文本（作为赞助方注释）。注意此处可使用富文本编辑器添加 HTML 标签。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/FormDef[@ImplementationNotes] 属性使用。
CRFForms.displayed_text: 在此指定表单的标签（使用默认语言）。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/FormDef/Description/TranslatedText/ 标签使用。启用多语言后，“Translations” 步骤器将允许将表单的显示文本翻译为相应语言。
CRFForms.compl_instructions: 在此提供可在 CRF 中显示为在线帮助的帮助文本。注意可使用富文本编辑器添加 HTML 标签。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/FormDef/[@CompletionInstructions] 属性使用。
CRFForms.vendor_extensions: 该步骤用于通过提供元素和/或属性来扩展表单。它将作为供应商扩展添加到 ODM/FormDef，例如 osb:displayAsTable='Yes'，或作为该 ODM 级别下的扩展。XML 命名空间用于在 XML 文档中提供唯一命名的元素和属性。还需提供此供应商扩展的数据类型，并注意该值可根据专用的允许值列表进行验证。
CRFForms.aliases: 别名为元素提供附加名称，此处针对表单元素。Context 属性指定该附加名称相关的应用领域。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/FormDef/Alias[@Context] 属性使用。
CRFForms.context: Context 属性指定该附加名称相关的应用领域。例如，可使用 'CDASH/SDTM'，其 'Name' = 'DM:Demographics'，则 ODM-XML 视图将其显示为注释。

CRFItemGroups.name: 提供项目组名称。ItemGroup 描述在研究中可能出现的一种项目组（将相关的临床问题组合在一起）。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中用作 /ODM/ItemGroupDef/@name 属性（必填字段）。
CRFItemGroups.oid: 在应用程序中指定一个“对象标识符”作为唯一 ID。由于我们定义的是项目组，它可以以 G.XXX 开头。这将作为 ODM-XML 文件中 /ODM/ItemGroupDef/@OID 属性（必填字段，可留空自动生成）。
CRFItemGroups.repeating: 指定项目组是否随时间重复。这将作为 /ODM/ItemGroupDef/@Repeating 属性，以是/否作答。
CRFItemGroups.description: 对所含研究元数据组件的自由文本描述。此信息将作为 /ODM/ItemGroupDef/Description/TranslatedText 使用。
CRFItemGroups.impl_notes: 在此提供说明该项目组在应用程序中如何使用的文本（作为赞助方注释）。注意可使用富文本编辑器添加 HTML 标签。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemGroupDef[@osb:instruction] 属性使用。
CRFItemGroups.displayed_text: 在此指定项目组的标签（使用默认语言）。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemGroupDef/Description/TranslatedText/ 标签使用。启用多语言后，“Translations” 步骤器将允许将表单的显示文本翻译为相应语言。
CRFItemGroups.compl_instructions: 在此提供可在 CRF 中显示为在线帮助的帮助文本。注意可使用富文本编辑器添加 HTML 标签。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemGroupDef[@osb:sponsorInstruction] 属性使用。
CRFItemGroups.aliases: 别名为元素提供附加名称，此处针对项目组元素。Context 属性指定该附加名称相关的应用领域。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemGroupDef/Alias[@Context] 属性使用。
CRFItemGroups.context: Context 属性指定该附加名称相关的应用领域。例如，可使用 'CDASH/SDTM'，其 'Name' = 'DM:Demographics|DS:Disposition'，则 ODM-XML 视图将其显示为两个 SDTM 域的注释。

CRFItems.name: 提供项目的名称。ItemDef 描述研究中可能出现的一种项目类型。项目属性包括名称、数据类型、计量单位、范围或代码列表限制以及其他属性。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemDef/@name 属性（必填）。
CRFItems.oid: 指定一个“对象标识符”作为应用中的唯一 ID。由于我们正在定义一个项目，可使用 I.XXX 开头。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemDef/@OID 属性（必填字段，若留空可自动填充）。
CRFItems.data_type: DataType 属性指定如何解释相应的值元素以用于比较和存储。当 DataType 为 text 或 string 时必须提供 Length 属性；当 DataType 为 integer 或 float 时可选；其他数据类型不应提供。当 DataType 为 float 时，SignificantDigits 属性可选，但其他数据类型不应提供。若 DataType 为 float，则 Length 与 SignificantDigits 要么同时提供，要么同时省略。
CRFItems.length: 若 DataType=integer，Length=N 表示接收系统必须能够处理并存储绝对值小于 10^N 的所有整数，较大的值可能被拒收。若 DataType=float，Length=N 且 SignificantDigits=S 表示接收系统必须能够处理并存储绝对值小于 10^(N-S) 且为 10^-S 倍数的所有数值，较大的值可能被拒收，中间值可四舍五入到最接近的 10^-S 倍数。若 DataType=text，Length=N 表示接收系统必须能够处理并存储长度小于等于 N 的所有文本字符串，文本字符串允许所有字符。Text 类型的数据应在 ItemDataString 元素中传输。
CRFItems.significant_digits: Length 和 SignificantDigits 描述的是项目的数据值，而不是在值元素中表示这些值所用的字符数量。例如，字符 '<' 可以表示为 '<'。对于特定 ODM 文件编码字符集之外的字符，必须使用 XML 实体或字符引用表示，例如 Æ 可表示为 'Æ'。
CRFItems.sas_name: SAS Name 可用于存储传统变量引用。
CRFItems.sds_name: SDSVarName 属性包含最新版本 CDISC SDTM 描述的提交信息，应该使用 SDTMIG 变量引用。
CRFItems.origin: Origin 属性包含最新版本 CDISC SDTM 描述的提交信息。
CRFItems.comment: Comment 属性包含最新版本 CDISC SDTM 描述的提交信息。
CRFItems.impl_notes: 在此提供说明该项目在应用中如何使用的文本（作为赞助商说明）。注意可使用富文本编辑器添加 HTML 标签。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemDef[@osb:instruction] 属性。
CRFItems.displayed_text: 在此指定项目的标签（使用默认语言）。这将在 ODM-XML 文件的 /ODM/ItemDef/Description/TranslatedText/ 标签中使用。当启用多语言时，“翻译”步骤允许对表单的显示文本进行相应翻译。
CRFItems.compl_instructions: 在此提供可在 CRF 中作为在线帮助显示的帮助文本。注意可使用富文本编辑器添加 HTML 标签。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemDef[@osb:sponsorInstruction] 属性。
CRFItems.vendor_extensions: 此步骤用于通过提供元素和/或属性扩展表单。它们将作为供应商内容添加到 ODM/ItemDef，例如 osb:displayAsTable='Yes'，或作为该 ODM 级别下的扩展。XML 命名空间用于在 XML 文档中提供唯一命名的元素和属性。还需提供此供应商扩展的数据类型，并注意其值可根据专用的可接受值列表进行验证。
CRFItems.aliases: 别名为元素提供附加名称，此处针对 Item 元素。Context 属性指定此附加名称所适用的应用领域。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 /ODM/ItemDef/Alias[@Context] 的 name 属性。
CRFItems.context: Context 属性指定该附加名称所适用的应用领域。例如，可使用 'CDASH/SDTM' 且 'Name' = 'VS:VSORRES'，则 ODM-XML 视图会将其显示为两个 SDTM 域的注释。

CrfAliases.name: 别名为元素提供附加名称，此处针对 ItemGroup 元素。Context 属性指定该附加名称适用的应用领域。这将在 ODM-XML 文件中作为 Alias[@Name] 属性。
CrfAliases.context: Context 属性指定该附加名称适用的应用领域。例如，可使用 'CDASH/SDTM' 且 'Name' = 'DM:Demographics|DS:Disposition'，则 ODM-XML 视图会将其显示为两个 SDTM 域的注释。

GenericTemplateForm.study_indication: 模板适用的适应症、情况、疾病或障碍。若模板是通用且不针对特定研究，请选择 NA（不适用）。
GenericTemplateForm.study_phase: 模板适用的研究阶段。若模板是通用且不针对特定研究，请选择 NA（不适用）。

ObjectiveTemplateForm.name: 目标示例：“在患有 [DiseaseDisorder] 的患者中，在 [TimePoint] 处，以 [ActivityInstance] 为依据，证明 [CompoundDosing] [NumericValue] [Dose Unit] 相较于 [Comparator] [NumericValue] [Dose Unit] 具有优势”或“记录 [StudyIntervention] 的安全性特征”。请添加用方括号 [ 和 ] 括起的参数。
ObjectiveTemplateForm.indication_disorder: 从下拉菜单中选择一个或多个适用此目标的适应症。如不适用，请勾选 NA。
ObjectiveTemplateForm.objective_category: 从下拉菜单中选择一个或多个适用此目标的类别。如不适用，请勾选 NA。
ObjectiveTemplateForm.confirmatory_testing: 使用单选按钮指定该模板是否用于表达与确证性测试相关的目标。对于与确证性测试相关的目标，必须明确目标，并说明其目的是证明优效、非劣或生物等效性。同时必须在目标中说明与确证性分析相关的终点（包括时间框架）。与确证性测试相关的目标示例：在患有 [DiseaseDisorder] 的患者中，在 [TimePoint] 处，以 [ActivityInstance] 为依据，证明 [CompoundDosing] [NumericValue] [Dose Unit] 相较于 [Comparator] [NumericValue] [Dose Unit] 具有优势。与确证性测试无关的目标示例：比较 [CompoundDosing] [NumericValue] [Dose Unit] 与 [Comparator] [NumericValue] [Dose Unit] 在患有 [DiseaseDisorder] 的患者中对血糖控制的安全性和有效性。

ActivityInstructionTemplateForm.indications: 模板适用的适应症、情况、疾病或障碍。若模板是通用且不针对特定适应症，请选择 NA（不适用）。
ActivityInstructionTemplateForm.group: 选择该活动所属的默认组（分组用于例如方案 SoA 显示）。如有需要，可在研究层面更改。
ActivityInstructionTemplateForm.sub_group: 选择该活动所属的一个或多个默认子组（子分组用于例如方案 SoA 显示）。如有需要，可在研究层面更改。
ActivityInstructionTemplateForm.activity: 若模板不针对特定活动，请选择 NA（不适用）。

ActivityInstructionTable.general: 研究中使用的活动说明列表。

ActivityForms.activity_group: 活动所属的组。要添加更多组，请点击右上角的“+”。
ActivityForms.activity_subgroup: 指定活动所属的子组，例如选择身体测量。
ActivityForms.name: 指定活动的名称，例如体型。
ActivityForms.nci_concept_id: NCI（美国国家癌症研究所）概念 ID 的引用。这些代码以“C”开头，后跟一串数字。所提供的代码可能是或可能不是 CDISC 使用的 C-code（CDISC C-code 是 NCI C-code 的子集）。
ActivityForms.is_data_collected: 若活动涉及数据收集，请勾选。
ActivityForms.abbreviation: 活动/活动实例/组/子组的缩写，可用于数据展示。
ActivityForms.definition: 提供活动的描述/定义，例如根据手腕围或肘部宽度将人体体型分为小、中、大。
ActivityForms.activity_name: 指定活动的名称，例如体型。

ActivityFormsGrouping.name: 指定组或子组的名称。组和子组用于搜索以及研究活动/SoA 的显示。
ActivityFormsGrouping.definition: 提供该组或子组的描述/定义。

ActivityFormsInstantiations.activities: 选择一个适用于该实例定义的活动。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.activity_group: 活动实例所属的活动组/子组。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.select_type: 选择要定义的实例类别。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.name: 指定该实例的名称。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.definition: 提供该实例的描述/定义。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.nci_concept_id: NCI（美国国家癌症研究所）概念 ID 的引用。这些代码以“C”开头，后跟一串数字。所提供的代码可能是或可能不是 CDISC 使用的 C-code（CDISC C-code 是 NCI C-code 的子集）。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.adamCode: 指定 ADaM 参数代码（惯例为参数（单位））。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.is_required_for_activity: 指示该活动实例是否为该活动所必需，即如果 SoA 中包含该活动，则操作性 SoA 中必须包含该活动实例。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.is_default_selected_for_activity: 若未做其他选择，该活动的默认活动实例。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.is_data_sharing: 指示该活动实例是否允许数据共享。
ActivityFormsInstantiations.is_legacy_usage: 指示该活动实例是否仅用于旧版，不应用于未来研究。

ActivityTable.activity_groups: 已定义的活动组列表。要创建新组或列出组，请转到此选项卡。
ActivityTable.activity_subgroups: 已定义的活动子组列表。要创建新的子组或列出子组，请转到此选项卡。
ActivityTable.activities_overview: 按组和子组排序显示活动。
ActivityTable.instances: 活动实例列表。显示活动与 ADaM 参数的关系。
ActivityTable.requested: 列出任何新增/更新活动的请求。
ActivityTable.sentence_case_name: 活动/活动实例/组/子组的句首大写名称
ActivityTable.abbreviation: 活动/活动实例/组/子组的缩写，可用于数据展示。
ActivityTable.definition: 活动实例/组/子组的定义
ActivityTable.nci_concept_id: NCI（美国国家癌症研究所）概念 ID 的引用。这些代码以“C”开头，后跟一串数字。所提供的代码可能是或可能不是 CDISC 使用的 C-code（CDISC C-code 是 NCI C-code 的子集）。
ActivityTable.adam_code: 在 ADaM 数据中用作 PARAM 代码的代码。
ActivityTable.is_data_collected: 指示该活动是否涉及数据收集。
ActivityTable.activity: 活动实例关联的活动。一个活动实例只能属于一个活动。
ActivityTable.instance: 活动的详细说明。例如，对于活动‘甘油三酯’，实例可以指定测试代码、单位、样本等。一个活动可以关联多个活动实例，每个实例描述特定项目。
ActivityTable.is_required_for_activity: 指示该活动实例是否为该活动所必需，即如果 SoA 中包含该活动，则操作性 SoA 中必须包含该活动实例。
ActivityTable.is_default_selected_for_activity: 若未做其他选择，该活动的默认活动实例。
ActivityTable.is_data_sharing: 指示该活动实例是否允许数据共享。
ActivityTable.is_legacy_usage: 指示该活动或活动实例是否仅用于旧版，不应用于未来研究。
ActivityTable.rationale_for_request: 说明为何需要该请求的文字说明。

ActivityOverview.general: 活动是在受试者身上执行的操作的定义。该活动名称是方案 SoA 中使用的总体名称。
ActivityOverview.cosmos_yaml: 该选项卡以 YAML 文件结构显示内容，命名符合 CDISC COSMoS 生物医学概念结构。
ActivityOverview.activity_groups: 活动所属的总体组。该分组也用于方案 SoA 显示以及在活动列表中搜索。
ActivityOverview.activity_subgroups: 这是组内的子分组。该子分组也用于方案 SoA 显示以及在活动列表中搜索。
ActivityOverview.adam_code: 在 ADaM 数据中用作 PARAM 代码的代码。
ActivityOverview.is_data_collected: 指示该活动是否涉及数据收集。
ActivityOverview.instances: 活动实例列表。活动实例是对活动的详细定义，例如指定单位、样本、位置等。
ActivityOverview.no_instances: 该活动没有可用的活动实例。
ActivityOverview.name: 名称
ActivityOverview.start_date: 该版本开始生效的日期
ActivityOverview.author: 创建或最后修改的用户

ActivityInstanceOverview.general: 活动实例是对活动的详细定义，显示相关限定符/条目，例如单位、位置、样本、给药方案。
ActivityInstanceOverview.cosmos_yaml: 该选项卡以 YAML 文件结构显示活动实例，命名符合 CDISC COSMoS 生物医学概念结构。
ActivityInstanceOverview.class: 该活动实例所属的类别。
ActivityInstanceOverview.adam_code: 在 ADaM 数据中用作 PARAM 代码的代码。
ActivityInstanceOverview.activity_group: 活动实例所属的总体组。活动实例只能属于其对应活动所属的组。
ActivityInstanceOverview.activity_subgroup: 这是组内的子分组。活动实例只能属于其对应活动所属的子组。
ActivityInstanceOverview.activity_groupings: 该活动实例分配的组和子组列表。
ActivityInstanceOverview.is_required_for_activity: 指示该活动实例是否为该活动所必需，即如果 SoA 中包含该活动，则操作性 SoA 中必须包含该活动实例。
ActivityInstanceOverview.is_default_selected_for_activity: 若未做其他选择，该活动的默认实例。
ActivityInstanceOverview.is_data_sharing: 指示该实例是否允许数据共享。
ActivityInstanceOverview.is_legacy_usage: 指示该实例是否仅用于旧版，不应用于未来研究。
ActivityInstanceOverview.item_type: 定义该活动实例的限定符/条目列表。对于某一活动实例，条目可能会不同。
ActivityInstanceOverview.items: 定义该实例的限定符/条目列表。对于某一实例，条目可能会不同。
ActivityInstanceOverview.ct_term_name: 若适用，条目所引用的术语，将列出允许/可选的术语。
ActivityInstanceOverview.item_class: 条目所属的类别，该类别决定信息在 SDTM/CDASH 中的映射位置。

SubgroupOverview.general: 活动子组是在活动组内的进一步分组。该分组用于方案 SoA 显示以及在活动列表中搜索。

GroupOverview.general: 活动组是相关活动的集合。活动组用于方案 SoA 显示以及在活动列表中搜索。

CompoundsView.general: 化合物的定义在“化合物”选项卡中创建。如需化合物的别名，可在“化合物别名”选项卡中定义。

CompoundForm.sponsor_compound: 指示此是否为申办方化合物。如申办方为该化合物的现有或未来上市许可持有人，请勾选“是”。
CompoundForm.analyte_number: 分析物编号（非临床），例如 AN000028（司美格鲁肽的分析物编号）。
CompoundForm.long_number: 化合物长编号。例如 NNC0113-0000-0217。仅适用于诺和诺德化合物，其他化合物留空。
CompoundForm.short_number: 化合物短编号。例如 NNC0113-0217。仅适用于诺和诺德化合物，其他化合物留空。
CompoundForm.name: 国际非专利名称（INN），即赋予药品或活性成分的官方通用名称。例如：司美格鲁肽。
CompoundForm.is_inn: 如 INN 尚未批准/公布，请选择“否”。
CompoundForm.brand_name: 由生产企业自行选择的商品名。多个公司可生产同一种通用名药物，每个公司都有自己的商品名。该名称通常为了便于记忆和宣传，或比通用名更易读写。例如对乙酰氨基酚的商品名包括 Panadol®、Calpol® 等。
CompoundForm.substance_name: 使用“+”按钮添加一个或多个物质。化合物可由一个或多个物质组成。
CompoundForm.medrt: 药物参考术语（MED-RT）（自动填充）
CompoundForm.dose: 指定药物剂量。例如 0.25 mg 司美格鲁肽。如需多个剂量，可点击“+”添加。
CompoundForm.strength: 指定药物强度。例如 1.34 mg/nL 司美格鲁肽。如需多个强度，可点击“+”添加。
CompoundForm.dosing_frequency: 从下拉列表中选择给药频率。例如司美格鲁肽为每周一次。
CompoundForm.route_of_administration: 从下拉列表中选择给药途径。例如司美格鲁肽为皮下注射。
CompoundForm.dosage_form: 从下拉列表中选择药剂形式。例如司美格鲁肽为浓缩注射液。
CompoundForm.dispensed_in: 从下拉列表中选择分发形式。例如司美格鲁肽为预充式注射笔。
CompoundForm.device: 从下拉列表中选择设备。例如司美格鲁肽为预充式注射笔。
CompoundForm.formulation: 制剂的简要描述（如适用）。
CompoundForm.formulation_details: 制剂的详细描述（如适用）。
CompoundForm.manufacturing_place: 生产地点，例如司美格鲁肽：Novo Nordisk A/S, Hallas Allé, DK-4400 Kalundborg, 丹麦。信息见产品标签附件。
CompoundForm.half_life: 指定半衰期的数值和单位。例如司美格鲁肽为 1 周。
CompoundForm.lag_time: 滞后时间：治疗结束后多少天内观察仍受药物影响。例如司美格鲁肽的不良事件，消除半衰期约 1 周，停药后约 5 周仍可在血液中检测到，即滞后时间为 5 周。
CompoundForm.sdtm_domain: 指定滞后时间适用的 SDTM 领域，例如 AE

CompoundAliasForm.step1_title: 选择要为其创建别名的化合物
CompoundAliasForm.name: 指定化合物的新名称/别名，例如 MyNewDrug
CompoundAliasForm.sentence_case_name: 句式名称将根据指定的名称/别名自动填充，例如 mynewdrug
CompoundAliasForm.is_preferred_synonym: 若这是贵组织的首选同义词，请勾选“是”。

EndpointTemplateForm.name: 终点由标题、时间范围和单位组成。例如：标题：收缩压变化；时间范围：从基线到第20周；单位：mmHg。组合后为“从基线到第20周收缩压的变化 (mmHg)”。通用模板可定义为：Change in [ActivityInstance] from [Time Point Reference] to [Time Point Reference] ([Unit])。将参数置于方括号 [ ] 中。
EndpointTemplateForm.endpoint_category: 从下拉列表中选择适用此终点的一个或多个类别。如不适用，请勾选 NA。
EndpointTemplateForm.endpoint_sub_category: 从下拉列表中选择适用此终点的一个或多个子类别。如不适用，请勾选 NA。关于类别的详细说明，请参阅“Objectives and endpoints library guidance”文档。在收缩压示例中，类别为“Continuous (relative change)”

TimeframeTemplateForm.name: 时间范围可以作为终点的一部分引用。例如：从基线（第0周）到第28周。模板可以为 'from [Time Point Reference] ([VisitName]) to [VisitName]'。将参数放在方括号 [ 和 ] 中。

CriteriaTemplateForm.guidance_text: 根据标准类型可以定义通用模板。例如：在签署知情同意书时年龄≥18岁可参数化为“在签署知情同意书时年龄[Operator][NumericValue][Age Unit]”。
CriteriaTemplateForm.indication: 选择此模板适用的适应症（如需要可选择多个）。如不适用请选择 NA。
CriteriaTemplateForm.criterion_cat: 选择该标准适用的一个或多个类别。年龄示例可适用于人口统计。若不适用请勾选 NA。此分类用于在为研究选择标准模板时进行搜索。
CriteriaTemplateForm.criterion_sub_cat: 选择适用于该标准的一个或多个子类别。若不适用请勾选 NA。此分类用于在为研究选择标准模板时进行搜索。

CodelistCreationForm.catalogue: 新的代码列表将在此目录中创建

CodelistSponsorValuesForm.pref_name: 申办方首选名称将被 StudyBuilder 用作代码列表的默认显示名称
CodelistSponsorValuesForm.tpl_parameter: 如果设置或激活，该代码列表将在创建模板时用作参数

CodelistAttributesForm.name: 提供代码列表名称，该名称代表数据项唯一允许的值
CodelistAttributesForm.subm_value: 提供唯一的提交值。如果存在重复，则应用程序会请求提供唯一值
CodelistAttributesForm.definition: 提供代码列表的完整定义

CodelistTermCreationForm.sponsor_pref_name: 术语的申办方首选名称
CodelistTermCreationForm.sponsor_sentence_case_name: 申办方句式名称应与申办方首选名称相同，但不含大写字母
CodelistTermCreationForm.term_name: 提供术语名称，该名称表示数据项唯一允许的回答
CodelistTermCreationForm.submission_value: 提供唯一的提交值。如果存在重复，则应用程序将使用该值
CodelistTermCreationForm.nci_pref_name: 如适用，提供首选的 NCI 名称
CodelistTermCreationForm.synonyms: 如适用，提供一个或多个同义词，并以 ';' 分隔。如果这些同义词已存在于数据库中，它们将被关联
CodelistTermCreationForm.order: 术语在代码列表中的顺序

DictionaryTermForm.dictionary_id: 添加字典术语的 ID。确保该 ID 符合字典命名规则。例如 Insulin Detemir (levemir) 的 UNII 为 4FT78T86XV，Insulin analogue 的 MED-RT 为 N0000175453，Diabetes Mellitus 的 SNOMED ID 为 73211009。
DictionaryTermForm.name: 术语名称。
DictionaryTermForm.lower_case_name: 自动填充为指定名称的小写形式。

UnitForm.ct_term: 选择表示此单位的受控术语项。
UnitForm.convertible_unit: Slide if the unit can be converted. e.g. mm is convertible to cm or meter, but the unit pH is not convertible.
UnitForm.ucum_unit: Select the equivalent unit in UCUM from the drop-down. For syntax rules see <a href='https://ucum.org/ucum.html.' target='_blank'>[Syntax Rules]<a>
UnitForm.display_unit: Slide if this unit is be used as a display unit, e.g. units used should be displayed in the output.
UnitForm.master_unit: Slide if this unit is the master unit of a unit dimension. All units are converted through the master unit. E.g the master unit for Length is m (meter)and if cm is to be converted to mm, then cm is first converted to meter, using the 'conversion factor to master' and then to mm. This is often the first unit created for a unit dimension and there can only be one master unit.It does not matter which unit is the Master Unit.
UnitForm.si_unit: Slide to indicate whether a unit is a SI unit.
UnitForm.us_unit: Slide to indicate whether a unit is a US unit.
UnitForm.dimension: Selection of the Unit Dimension, that the unit belongs to, which means the unit can be converted to the other units in the same Unit Dimension, using the conversion factors defined (except when convertible unit flag is unticked) E.g. cm and mm are in the unit dimension 'length' and can be converted to each other. The naming of these are not used but should be meaningful.
UnitForm.legacy_code: Reference to the name of the code in the legacy system.
UnitForm.molecular_weight: Type either 0 or 1. Molecular weight is needed for the conversion if a unit contains 'mol'(e.g. mmol/L) as part of the unit then this field=1 otherwise this field=0
UnitForm.conversion_factor: Conversion factor from unit defined to the master unit. All simple unit conversions are converted through the master unit.

TimeframeForm.select_template: 要创建时间范围实例，请从相关库及其列出的模板中选择。

StudyForm.project_id: Select the project ID from the drop-down list. For details on project see <a href='https://novonordisk.sharepoint.com/sites/ProjectToolbox' target='_blank'>[Project Toolbox]<a>
StudyForm.brand_name: Auto-populated based on selected project (only populated if brand name exists)
StudyForm.study_id: ID that will be generated for this study
StudyForm.acronym: Optional free-text field (expect if used instead of study number in the early planning phase)

NullFlavorSelect.label: If value is missing, select reason (null flavor)

RegistryIdentifiersForm.ct_gov_id: 在 ClinicalTrials.gov 注册的临床研究所分配的唯一识别代码。格式为“NCT”加上 8 位数字（如 NCT00000419）。
RegistryIdentifiersForm.eudract_id: 欧盟药物监管机构临床试验识别号。格式为 YYYY-NNNNNN-CC，其中 YYYY 为发放年份，NNNNNN 为六位顺序号，CC 为校验位（如 2007-002422-29）。
RegistryIdentifiersForm.universal_trial_number_utn: WHO 国际临床试验注册识别号。格式为 Uxxxx-xxxx-xxxx，其中 x 为数字（如 U1111-1168-4339）。
RegistryIdentifiersForm.japanese_trial_registry_id_japic: 日本药品信息中心（JAPIC）识别号。格式为 Japic CTI-xxxxxx，其中 x 为数字（如 Japic CTI-111668）。
RegistryIdentifiersForm.investigational_new_drug_application_num: 制药公司获 FDA 许可开始人体临床试验时提供的识别号。格式为 IND Number xxxxxx，其中 x 为数字（如 IND Number: 132371）。

StudyDefineForm.general: This section is for defining the Study. For requesting a term/value added to drop-down list, please refer to SharePoint
StudyDefineForm.studytype: Select value that reflects the overall study type. For definition of study types see <a href='{url}' target='_blank'>[Study Type]<a>
StudyDefineForm.studyintent: Select the values that reflect the planned purposes of the therapy or device being investigated in the study
StudyDefineForm.trialtype: Select the values that reflect the trial type(s) that is within the study purpose. For definition of the trial types see <a href='{url}' target='_blank'>[Trial Type Response]<a>
StudyDefineForm.trialphase: Select relevant phase or stage, of the study
StudyDefineForm.studystoprule: 决定临床试验终止时间点的规则、法规和/或条件。根据方案规定的停止规则。如果没有停止规则，请在此字段中记录“NONE”。
StudyDefineForm.extensiontrial: Indicate whether the study is an extension trial
StudyDefineForm.adaptivedesign: Indicate if the study includes a prospectively planned opportunity for modification of one or more specified aspects of the study design and hypotheses based on analysis of data (usually interim data) from subjects in the study
StudyDefineForm.post_auth_safety_indicator: An indication as to whether the clinical study is a post authorization safety study
StudyDefineForm.confirmed_resp_min_duration: 方案规定达到治疗确认反应定义所需的最短时间。填写数值和单位，或选择 NA

StudyPopulationForm.therapeuticarea: The overall research or development area to which the study belongs (cover investigation of specific treatments for diseases and pathologic findings, as well as prevention of conditions that negatively impact the health of an individual)
StudyPopulationForm.disease_condition: The condition, disease or disorder that the study is intended to investigate or address. Ex. Retinopathy
StudyPopulationForm.diagnosis_group: The grouping of individuals on the basis of a shared procedure or disease, or lack thereof. Ex. Diabetes mellitus type 2
StudyPopulationForm.rare_disease_indicator: Indicate whether the condition under study is considered a rare disease. FDA:a disease or condition that affects less than 200.000 people in the United States. EU/WHO: A disease is considered to be rare when the number of people affected is less than 5 per 10.000
StudyPopulationForm.healthy_subjects: Indicate if persons who have not had the condition(s) being studied or otherwise related conditions or symptoms, as specified in the eligibility requirements, may participate in the study
StudyPopulationForm.planned_min_max_age: The anticipated minimum and maximum ages of the subjects to be entered into the study
StudyPopulationForm.pinf: Positive infinity. Fx. Planned Maximum Age of Subjects, there is no value if a study does not specify a maximum age. In this case, the appropriate null flavor is 'PINF'
StudyPopulationForm.pediatric_study_indicator: Indicate whether the study is a paediatric study, i.e. study in children
StudyPopulationForm.pediatric_postmarket_study_indicator: Indicate whether the study is a paediatric post-market study, i.e. study in children done after initial approval of the compound being studied
StudyPopulationForm.pediatric_investigation_plan_indicator: Indicate whether the study is part of a paediatric investigation plan (PIP), i.e. study in children
StudyPopulationForm.stable_disease_min_duration: 方案规定达到疾病稳定定义所需的最短时间
StudyPopulationForm.relapse_criteria: A standard from which a judgment concerning a disease relapse can be established. Ex. the NCI/Rome criteria is a standard for relapse in Acute Lymphoblastic Leukaemia
StudyPopulationForm.number_of_expected_subjects: The total number of subjects expected to be screened
StudyPopulationForm.sex_of_study_participants: The specific sex, either male, female, or mixed of the subject group being studied.
StudyPopulationForm.na: Not Applicable. Fx. in a clinical pharmacology study conducted in healthy volunteers for a drug where indications are not yet established

StudyInterventionTypeForm.intervention_type: 研究中调查的产品或程序类型。请从下拉列表中选择。Behavioral Intervention（例如心理治疗、生活方式咨询）、Biological Agent（例如病毒、治疗血清、毒素、抗毒素、疫苗、血液、血液成分或衍生物、过敏原产品或类似产品）、Dietary Supplement（例如维生素、矿物质、草药、氨基酸、提取物和代谢物）、Gene Therapy（将遗传物质引入细胞以纠正或治疗先天或获得性疾病，例如基因转移、干细胞和重组DNA）、Medical Device（例如用于一种或多种特定医疗目的的仪器、器具、工具、机器、设备、植入物、体外试剂、软件、材料或其他类似相关物品，可单独或组合使用）、Pharmacologic Substance（例如活性物质/药物，包括安慰剂）、Physical Medical Procedure（例如通过手动和/或器械手段为诊断、治疗、预防或姑息护理而进行的活动）。如果研究类型为“INTERVENTIONAL”，则此参数为必填项（见研究设计/研究类型）。
StudyInterventionTypeForm.study_intent_type: 临床试验中研究的治疗、器械或试剂的计划用途。
StudyInterventionTypeForm.intervention_model: 将干预措施分配给临床研究参与者的总体设计。例如，Single Group：只有一个试验组的临床试验；Parallel：参与者在整个研究期间被分配到两个或更多组之一；Crossover：参与者在研究初始阶段接受两种（或更多）替代干预之一，在第二阶段接受另一种；Factorial：两个或更多干预单独及组合与对照组同时评估；Group Sequential：根据研究中达到的先前里程碑分组给予干预，例如某些剂量递增和自适应设计研究；
StudyInterventionTypeForm.control_type: 用于评估研究治疗的比较对象。Active Control：具有确切疗效并作为比较对象给临床试验受试者的对照类型；Dose Response Control：在各治疗组使用同一治疗的不同剂量或方案的对照类型；Placebo Control：不含受试产品的惰性、外观相同的药物或治疗。
StudyInterventionTypeForm.randomised: 指明将研究参与者分配到治疗组或对照组是否通过随机化完成。随机化是一种利用随机方式将试验对象分配到治疗组或对照组以减少偏倚的过程。注意：不等比例随机化用于以不同比例将受试者分配到各组，例如每有一名受试者分配到对照组，就有三名分配到治疗组。
StudyInterventionTypeForm.strfactor: 在随机化过程中选择的因素，用于确保这些因素在研究的每个试验组中保持平衡。受试者层面的这些因素值可在统计模型和敏感性分析中作为固定效应。如适用，可根据需要使用多行，每行一个因素。
StudyInterventionTypeForm.blinding_schema: 用于描述研究参与者和/或研究者对其接受和/或实施的干预知晓程度的设计类型。Double Blind：受试者、研究者以及在试验期间与受试者或数据接触的研究团队均不知道受试者接受的治疗。Open Label：受试者和研究者均知道每位受试者所接受的产品；与盲法或双盲研究相反。Open Label for Treatment And Double Blind to Dose：治疗为开放标签，但试验药品（IMP）的剂量信息为双盲。Single Blind：研究者或受试者其中一方不知道受试者接受的药物或安慰剂；亦称单盲研究。
StudyInterventionTypeForm.planned_st_length: 对单个受试者计划的观察时长
StudyInterventionTypeForm.added_to_et: 在临床研究中将治疗产品添加到现有方案中，且两者仍为独立产品

StudyCompoundForm.general: 化合物在 Study Builder 库中定义。如需新化合物或现有化合物的附加信息，必须在库中创建。
StudyCompoundForm.type_of_treatment: 每种治疗类型将被归类为 IMP（研究用药）或 NIMP（非研究用药），用于生成方案中的研究干预表。从下拉列表中选择干预类型。研究用产品（IMP）：下列研究药物将关联至 TSPARM 'TRT' 和 SDTM.EX；对照治疗（IMP）：下列研究药物将关联至 TSPARM 'COMPTRT' 和 SDTM.EX；安慰剂治疗（IMP）：下列研究药物不关联 TSPARM，但信息用于 SDTM.EX；现用治疗（NIMP）：下列研究药物将关联至 TSPARM 'CURTRT' 和 SDTM.EX。若治疗类型为“研究用产品”“对照治疗”或“现用治疗”，可勾选 NA，表示不提供化合物细节（编辑菜单中选择别名和化合物详情的步骤将消失），需提供 NA 原因。
StudyCompoundForm.compound: 从下拉列表选择化合物。
StudyCompoundForm.compound_alias: 从下拉列表选择化合物别名
StudyCompoundForm.dosage_form: 从下拉列表选择研究使用的剂型。
StudyCompoundForm.compound_strength_value: 从下拉列表选择研究使用的强度。
StudyCompoundForm.route_of_admin: 从下拉列表选择适用于本研究的给药途径。
StudyCompoundForm.dispensed_in: 从下拉列表选择分发形式。
StudyCompoundForm.device: 从下拉列表选择使用的装置。
StudyCompoundForm.other: 关于该化合物的其他适用信息描述。

StudyCompoundDosingForm.element: 从下拉列表选择研究要素
StudyCompoundDosingForm.compound: 从下拉列表选择化合物
StudyCompoundDosingForm.dose_value: 从下拉列表选择剂量值，例如 500mg
StudyCompoundDosingForm.dose_frequency: 从下拉列表选择给药频率，例如 每日

StudyObjectiveTable.general: 使用菜单下的添加按钮添加所需目标。目标可以基于标准模板、从其他研究中选择或从头创建。某些目标包含以橙色文本（参数标签）或绿色文本（参数值）突出显示的参数，可通过表中每个可编辑目标旁的“编辑”按钮选择新值或省略该参数。

StudyArmsForm.arm_name: Full label of the arm, e.g., Placebo
StudyArmsForm.arm_short_name: Abbreviated name of the arm, e.g. PBO
StudyArmsForm.arm_type: Investigational - intervention being investigated; Comparator - intervention the investigational intervention is compared against; Placebo - choose when the comparator is placebo; Observational - no intervention is made.
StudyArmsForm.arm_code: An abbreviated code of the interventions in the arm, e.g., AB for a cross-over study with Drug A followed by Drug B or PBO for a placebo arm
StudyArmsForm.randomisation_group: The group assigned in the randomisation list, e.g. A=AB and B=BA from the randomisation list.
StudyArmsForm.planned_number: The planned number of subjects in the arm.

StudyEpochForm.epoch_type: No Treatment: used for a period in a treatment when a treatment pause is made, e.g. a washout in a cross-over study. Post Treatment: period after treatment has ended, e.g. Follow-up. Treatment: the period where the treatment(s) is given. Pre Treatment: period before treatment has started, e.g. screening
StudyEpochForm.epoch_subtype: Epochs as defined by CDISC EPOCH controlled terminology with possible sponsor extensions. Basic: for non-visit events (e.g. AE) and unscheduled visits.
StudyEpochForm.name: Auto-populated. Epoch name is describing the purpose of the period, e.g. Treatment Epoch.
StudyEpochForm.description: Describe the overall purpose of the epoch
StudyEpochForm.start_rule: Describe the rule for when the epoch is expected to start, e.g. a specific visit
StudyEpochForm.stop_rule: Describe the rule for when the epoch is expected to end, e.g. a specific visit or when a certain goal is reached
StudyEpochForm.color: Choose a colour for the visualisation of the epoch on the study timeline view.
StudyEpochForm.epoch_time_unit: Pending implementation. The time unit in which the epoch duration is being measured.
StudyEpochForm.expected_epoch_duration: Pending implementation. Derived based on time from first visit in this epoch to first visit in the following epoch

StudyElements.el_name: Long-label of the element, e.g. Standardised Meal
StudyElements.el_short_name: Abbreviated/short name for the element, e.g. STD MEAL
StudyElements.el_sub_type: From the drop-down select the type of element
StudyElements.el_type: Select element type (treatment/no treatment), will subset based on element sub-type selected.

StudyEndpointTable.general: 使用菜单下方的添加按钮添加所需终点。终点可基于标准模板、从其他研究中选择或从头创建。某些终点包含以橙色文本（参数标签）或绿色文本（参数值）突出显示的参数，可通过表中每个可编辑终点旁的“编辑”按钮选择新值或省略该参数。

StudyVisitForm.vtype_step_label: 选择访视类型：按方案计划的访视为计划访视。非计划访视是为捕捉可能发生在正常时间表之外的活动（如额外的实验室样本）而增加的访视。非访视用于与任何访视无关的研究活动，例如自测血糖结果。非计划访视和非访视是大多数研究中进行正确 SDTM 映射所需的占位符。特殊访视是没有具体时间但与数据收集相关的访视。特殊访视始终与另一访视相关，并在活动时间表中显示为 VxxA、VxxB 等（其中“xx”为相关访视的编号）。此类访视还可用作“提前停药访视”，在计划的治疗结束访视之外采集特定数据。此时，特殊访视将命名为 VxxX。试验中可能存在多个提前停药访视，额外的提前停药访视将命名为 VxxY 和 VxxZ。如果在研究首例受试者入组（FPFV）后因方案修订需要新增访视，则必须使用手动定义访视。FPFV 之后更改已实现访视的名称或编号可能产生严重后果，而添加手动定义访视不会影响已收集的数据。
StudyVisitForm.period: Select the study period (epoch) applicable for the visit. The epoch types correspond to the epochs defined in the Study Epochs tab.
StudyVisitForm.single_anchor_addtional: Selection is applicable only if visit scheduling type is scheduled. For newly created visits by default the Single Visit radiobutton is selected. If visits need subgrouping, e.g. a set of days (Day 1, Day 2, Day 3) to be grouped into a one visit (Visit 3), then select Anchor visit in visit group. It will allow to create Visit 3 Day 1, which will be the local anchor visit for subsequent sub-visits. To add subsequent visits (Visit 3 Day 2, Visit 3 Day 3) then, while creating them, select Additional sub-visit radiobutton and appropriate anchor visit from the time reference drop-down. Repeating visits can typically be used for non-interventional studies, where participants return for the same visit multiple times during the study according to their individual needs (for example, one participant may come to visit 3 five times, while another may have 10 visits as visit 3). If there are any requirements about the repetition of such visits (daily, weekly, monthly), then it can be defined via the Repeating frequency item. If visits require a different frequency than those present on the pull-down list, then leave Repeating frequency item blank and provide the proper frequency by entering the details into the Visit description item.
StudyVisitForm.visit_type: For definition of visit types see: Library, Code Lists, Sponsor, and filter Sponsor Preferred name=VisitType or Concept ID CTCodelist_000002 to review the terms. Additional Visit types can be requested via the Study Standards Developer. To create an information visit as Visit 0, use the Visit type=Information and set negative timing towards Global anchor visit. Visit types can be marked as SoA milestones in a study.
StudyVisitForm.contact_mode: Specify how subject interacts with the study investigator at the visit.
StudyVisitForm.anchor_visit: If ticked, it will set visit timing to 0 days and define this visit as a global anchor (Day 1 of the study). Usually this refers to randomisation visit. There can be only one global anchor visit per study.
StudyVisitForm.current_anchor_visit: It displays the visit that has been designated as Global anchor visit using the Anchor visit tick mark. If not set, then it will be left blank.
StudyVisitForm.time_reference: Select the reference for the visit, e.g. reference to Global anchor visit or reference to the previous visit. For the first entered visit (e.g. Screening), the Global anchor visit can be selected as reference only. For Special Visit, time reference is indicating the visit name that the special visit is related to.
StudyVisitForm.time_value: Please enter numeric value: negative or positive number to reflect how many days/weeks/years before/after the time reference does the visit occur. Time unit can bet set using the Time unit drop-down.
StudyVisitForm.time_unit: The time unit for the timing of the visit
StudyVisitForm.visit_name: To be selected manually for Manually defined visits. Auto-populated for other visit types.
StudyVisitForm.visit_short_name: To be selected manually for Manually defined visits. Auto-populated for other visit types.
StudyVisitForm.visit_window_min: 输入按方案允许的最早访视时间（天/周/年），即访视可在计划时间点之前发生的时间。
StudyVisitForm.visit_window_max: 输入按方案允许的最晚访视时间（天/周/年），即访视可在计划时间点之后发生的时间。
StudyVisitForm.visit_description: Text field to add description of the visit.
StudyVisitForm.epoch_allocation: Observations at a visit might be affected by treatment administered in a previous epoch. Example: Baseline visit (in treatment epoch) where subjects are instructed to take first medication the next day will have measurements taken that represents 'Pre Treatment' epoch treatment, i.e. No treatment. In this case the Epoch Allocation Rule should be Previous Visit. In most cases the rule is Current Visit, i.e. measurements at this visit is measurements of the treatment (element) given in the epoch. The corresponding rules with Date is to be used for Non-visits and unscheduled visits. The Actual Treatment is used if the actual treatment of the subject at the visit is to be used instead of the planned treatment. Reach out to the study SDTM programmer for further information.
StudyVisitForm.visit_start_rule: Enter visit start rule. Describe when the visit starts, in relation to the sequence of elements, e.g. 2 weeks after start of Treatment Epoch
StudyVisitForm.visit_stop_rule: Enter visit stop rule. Describe when the visit ends, in relation to the sequence of elements e.g. At End of Trial
StudyVisitForm.duplicate_visit: To create new visit that will be a copy of the previously defined visit, click on 3 dots next to the row of the visit that you want to copy and select Duplicate. Specify the timing and timing unit for newly created visit. The time reference is the same as for the visit being copied from. E.g. if for the visit 7 that you are copying the Time reference is Global anchor visit and timing set to 7 days, then new visit, visit 8, with timing selected as 8 days is taking place 8 days after global anchor visit. Note, you cannot duplicate global anchor visit (e.g. very often this is randomisation visit).

StudyVisitDuplicate.time_value: Numeric. Negative or Positive number of e.g. days before/after the time reference does the visit occur. Note: the reference is the same as the visit being copied from. Time unit can bet set using the Time Unit drop-down.
StudyVisitDuplicate.time_unit: The time unit for the timing of the visit

Settings.rows: 界面中各表格每页显示的默认行数。
Settings.study_number_length: 研究编号的位数，例如类型为 PROT-2739 的研究编号长度为 4，用于验证研究编号是否正确。
Settings.toggle: 滑动以切换界面的深色或浅色主题。
Settings.multilingual_crf: 如需 CRF 支持多种语言，请开启此选项。

StudyCriteriaTable.general: 研究的受试者资格标准，如方案中所述
StudyCriteriaTable.study_criteria: 按照各选项卡定义适用于研究的不同标准

EligibilityCriteriaForm.add_criteria: 标准可以基于通用模板、从其他研究中选择或从头创建
EligibilityCriteriaForm.create_from_template: 基于预定义模板的标准。有些标准包含以橙色文本（参数标签）或绿色文本（参数值）突出显示的参数，可选择新的值，或省略该参数。
EligibilityCriteriaForm.create_from_scratch: 从头编写你自己的标准
EligibilityCriteriaForm.select_criteria_templates: 使用复制图标从模板列表中复制标准。保存所有标准模板后按“保存”。系统将返回到标准列表，在表中可使用每个可编辑标准旁的“编辑”按钮来填写模板。

EligibilityCriteriaEditForm.title: 对于基于模板的标准，从下拉列表中选择实际值以替换参数。

StudyProperties.general: 在每个选项卡（研究类型和研究属性）中，按照方案描述填写研究的详细信息。
StudyProperties.study_type: Overall description of the study by selection of prespecified controlled terms. This information is part of the mandatory SDTM.TS domain (Trial Summary).
StudyProperties.study_attributes: Overall description of the study design and interventions/intervention model. This information is part of the mandatory SDTM.TS domain (Trial Summary).

StudyStructure.general: The structure describes what kind of planned investigational intervention (e.g. drug treatment, surgery, exercise) will be done to subjects in the course of the trial. Follow the tabs to complete the definition of the Study Design. Note, you must define Epochs before study Visits can be made.
StudyStructure.study_arms: Specification of the planned investigational treatment arms. An arm is a planned 'path' of interventions through the trial, e.g. arm AB is treatment A followed by treatment B.
StudyStructure.study_branches: The decision points where subjects are divided into separate treatment groups. For a simple parallel or cross-over design subject are branched into treatment arms at randomisation. i.e. have one branch decision point. A study can have more branching points if e.g. subjects are assigned to a recover treatment after initial randomisation. This second decision point could be based on a responsiveness to treatment.
StudyStructure.study_cohorts: A group of individuals who share a common exposure, experience or characteristic or a group of individuals followed-up or traced over time in a cohort study. Example could be first human dose-escalation studies where increasing doses are given until stopping criteria are met. Some dose-escalation studies enroll a new cohort of subjects (a new group of subjects) for each new dose. Cohorts are also used for observational studies where no randomisation takes place or single arm randomised study. Then cohorts are being defined based on some characteristics and comparisons are made between the different cohorts, e.g. treatment of a drug in subjects with a liver disease compared to a group of healthy subjects. Cohorts are not the same as strata. Stratification is the process of dividing members of the population into homogeneous subgroups before sampling/randomisation. If the study with liver diseased and healthy subjects had to examine the effect of a drug compared to placebo then liver diseased/healthy would be a stratification factor, since it is expected that the treatment responses will be different in the two groups. Stratification is made to ensure homogeneity of the groups in which the treatments are being compared.
StudyStructure.study_epochs: The study epoch is a period of time that serves a purpose in the trial, e.g. Screening, Treatment, Follow-up. The purpose of ex. a Treatment epoch will be to expose subjects to a treatment.
StudyStructure.study_elements: An element is the basic building block of intervention. It can be both a treatment (Drug A/ Placebo) or no treatment (Screening, Wash-out, Follow-up)
StudyStructure.study_visits: A clinical encounter where the the subject interacts with the investigator. There can be one more visits in an Epoch. To edit visit(s) in the table view click on the pencil in the top-right menu.
StudyStructure.design_matrix: The tabular (matrix) view of the study arms, epochs and elements. Click on the pencil to select the elements in the epochs for the different arms
StudyStructure.edit_visit_tableview: To edit visits in a tabular view (all visits displayed) then click on the pencil (top right menu of the table). Use the dropdowns to change information as needed. To save an edit for row (a visit) click on the context menu and press Save. This must be done for all visits edited to save the edits. If timing or time reference is changed then the visits timeline will be recalculated and the visit edited may change Visit name. Tip: Write the original Visits name/number in the Visit Description to track where the visit being edited has been placed on the visit timeline. Delete the note afterwards.
StudyStructure.disease_milestones: A disease milestone is an event or activity that can be anticipated in the course of a disease, and which trigger the collection of data, but whose timing is not controlled by the study schedule (Planned visits). A disease milestone may also be something that occurred pre-study. Example is DIAGNOSIS (activity typically occurred pre-study), or HYPOGLYCAEMIC EVENT (event anticipated during a diabetes study). A Disease Milestone can be marked for repetition for milestones expected more than once in a study. If a new milestone is need in the drop-down it must be added to the codelist MIDSTYPE in the StudyBuilder Library.

StudyBranchArms.study_arm: Select the study arm in which the branching applies.
StudyBranchArms.branch_arm_name: Specify the long name of the branch, example: 'Responders' or 'Non-responders'
StudyBranchArms.branch_arm_short_name: The short name of the branch arm, example: 'Resp' or 'Non-Resp'
StudyBranchArms.randomisation_group: Specify the randomisation group defined for this Arm/branch Arm combination.
StudyBranchArms.nuber_of_subjects: The planned number of subjects in the branch. Note that cannot be larger than the number of subject defined for the arm.
StudyBranchArms.description: A description of the branch, e.g. for the responder: HbA1c < 45 mmol/L after 4 weeks
StudyBranchArms.colour: Select the colour for this branch (will be displayed in the design matrix).

StudyCohorts.study_arm: Select the study arm in which the cohort applies.
StudyCohorts.study_branch_arm: Select the study branch arm in which the cohort applies. Leave blank if no branching is used.
StudyCohorts.cohort_name: Long name of the cohort, e.g. 'Liver disease' or 'Healthy Liver'
StudyCohorts.cohort_short_name: The corresponding short name, e.g. LF or HL
StudyCohorts.cohort_code: A short code for the cohort.
StudyCohorts.nuber_of_subjects: The planned number of subjects in the cohort. Note that cannot be larger than the number of subject defined for the arm/branch arm.
StudyCohorts.description: A description of the cohort, e.g. Liver disease as defined by Child-Pugh score Class B+C
StudyCohorts.colour: Select the colour for this cohort (will be displayed in the design matrix).

StudyPopulationTable.general: Overall specification of the participants that will be recruited to the study

StudyInterventionsTable.general: The description of drug, device, therapy, or process under investigation in a clinical study. Follow the tabs to fill in the details on the compounds/other interventions for the study. The Overview tab will provide a tabular overview of the compounds specified.

StudyTitleView.general: Click on the pencil to add a study title or copy from an existing study.
StudyTitleView.title: 临床研究的标题，应与方案标题一致。

StudyTitleForm.general: Fill in the study title and short title or re-use from similar study from the table. Use the copy icon to copy from a study.

SelectOrAddStudyTable.general: 要添加新研究，请点击 +- 按钮。要从列表中选择或编辑研究，请使用表格中行左侧的纵向点菜单。

RegistryIdentifiersTable.general: Specify the relevant study identifiers. Click on the pencil to add value. Tick NA if not relevant

StudyActivityTable.general:
You can choose from 3 different options:
Select from studies: Selection of activities from existing studies.
Select from library: Selection of activities from the library
Create a placeholder for new activity Request: If your activity is not available within the library you can create a placeholder for your missing activity and request it later.

CTDashboard.general: 仪表板提供对代码列表及其术语的操作概览（新增/更新/删除）。最新添加的代码列表列在底部表格中。

CtCataloguesTable.general: CT 目录显示所有 CDISC 和赞助方代码列表及术语的最新版本。使用页面顶部的选项卡在术语集之间切换。使用“全部”显示所有代码列表。提示：右键单击选项卡在新窗口/标签页中打开 CT。
CtCataloguesTable.ADAM_CT: 分析数据模型受控术语，用于统计分析数据。
CtCataloguesTable.CDASH_CT: 临床数据采集标准协调受控术语，用于数据收集，例如 eCRF/表单。
CtCataloguesTable.COA CT: 临床结局评估受控术语。COA 是描述或反映患者感受、功能或存活状况的测量。COA 包括以下类型的评估工具：临床医生报告结局 (ClinRO)、观察者报告结局 (ObsRO)、患者报告结局 (PRO)、表现结局 (PerfO)。
CtCataloguesTable.DEFINE_XML: Define.xml 受控术语。Define.xml 是一份描述 SDTM 或 ADaM 数据集结构和内容的数据定义文档。
CtCataloguesTable.GLOSSARY_CT: 术语表受控术语。提供一系列定义，通过澄清和消除临床研究中关键概念的歧义来支持其他 CDISC 标准。
CtCataloguesTable.PROTOCOL_CT: 方案受控术语。用于支持 CDISC 方案标准的术语
CtCataloguesTable.QRS_CT: 问卷、评分和量表受控术语。每个 QRS 工具由一系列问题、任务或评估组成，用于在临床研究中对临床概念或任务观察进行定性或定量评估。
CtCataloguesTable.QS_FT_CT: 问卷和功能测试受控术语。自 2014 年 12 月 19 日发布 CDISC 术语后，独立的问卷和功能测试 (QS-FT) 术语已弃用，其内容并入临床结局评估 (COA) 术语。
CtCataloguesTable.SDTM_CT: 研究数据列示受控术语，用于支持收集数据的列示。SDTM 是向 FDA（美国）和 PMDA（日本）提交数据所需的标准之一。
CtCataloguesTable.SEND_CT: 非临床数据交换标准受控术语。SEND 是 SDTM 标准在非临床研究中的实现，是向 FDA 提交数据所需的标准之一。

CtPackagesTable.general: CT 包显示所有 CDISC 和赞助方代码列表及术语的所有版本。使用页面顶部的选项卡在术语集之间切换。提示：右键单击选项卡在新窗口/标签页中打开 CT。要查看特定包版本，请点击左侧菜单中的日期。要比较版本，请点击菜单中的日历图标。
CtPackagesTable.ADAM_CT: 分析数据模型受控术语，用于统计分析数据。
CtPackagesTable.CDASH_CT: 临床数据采集标准协调受控术语，用于数据收集，例如 eCRF/表单。

CtSponsorTable.general: 显示赞助方代码列表的最新版本概览。使用页面顶部的选项卡显示特定术语子集。使用“全部”显示所有代码列表。提示：右键单击选项卡在新窗口/标签页中打开 CT。

CtSponsorPackagesTable.general: CT 赞助方包显示 CDISC 和赞助方代码列表及术语的所有版本。通过选择 CT 赞助方包日期查看特定术语子集。

SnomedTable.general: SNOMED CT (Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine -- Clinical Terms) is a standardized, multilingual vocabulary of clinical terminology that is used by physicians and other health care providers for the electronic exchange of clinical health information.

MedRtTable.general: Medication Reference Terminology. Dictionary used to identify the pharmacologic class(es) of all active investigational substances that are used in a study (either clinical or nonclinical).

UniiTable.general: Unique Ingredient Identifier.FDA's Global Substance Registration System.

UcumTable.general: Code system intended to include all units of measures. UCUM is used in healthcare to populate electronic health records, such as laboratory records in LOINC, and in the ISO IDMP standard (Identification of Medicinal Products).

UCUM.code: Add the code for the new UCUM. For syntax rules see <a href='https://ucum.org/ucum.html.' target='_blank'>[UCUM]<a>
UCUM.description: Add an description of the UCUM code.

ActivitiesTable.general: 活动是临床研究中在受试者身上执行的测量或操作的定义。

ObjectiveTemplatesTable.general: Generic templates for objectives are defined here. Click on the + button to add a new template. In the User Defined Templates you can view templates being defined on different studies. To make a template accessible for use it must be approved. Use the Approve in the left context-menu (3 vertical dots to the left of the template). To set default values for parameters use the 'Default' values in the context menu.

EndpointTemplatesTable.general: 此处定义终点的通用模板。点击 + 按钮可添加新模板。在“用户定义模板”中可查看在不同研究中定义的模板。要使模板可用，必须先批准，请在左侧上下文菜单（模板左侧的三个竖点）中选择“批准”。如需为参数设置默认值，请在上下文菜单中使用“默认值”选项。

TimeframeTemplatesTable.general: 此处定义时间范围的通用模板。点击 + 按钮可添加新模板。在“用户定义的模板”中可以查看在不同研究中定义的模板。要使模板可使用，必须先批准，请使用左侧上下文菜单（模板左侧的三个垂直点）中的“批准”。要为参数设置默认值，请在上下文菜单中使用“默认值”选项。

CriteriaTemplatesTable.general: 此处定义各种标准的通用模板。点击 + 按钮添加新模板。在“用户定义模板”中可以查看在不同研究中定义的模板。要使模板可用，必须先批准。请使用左侧上下文菜单中的“批准”（模板左侧的三个竖点）。要为参数设置默认值，请在上下文菜单中使用“默认值”选项。

ActivityTemplatesTable.general: 此处定义活动的通用模板。活动指与受试者健康相关的测量或记录，例如血液测量、检查、不良事件、干预等。点击 + 按钮可添加新模板。在“用户定义模板”中可查看在不同研究中定义的模板。要使模板可用，必须先审批；请在左侧上下文菜单（三个竖点）中选择“批准”。如需设置参数的默认值，请在上下文菜单中使用“默认值”。

ObjectivesTable.general: The list of objectives and which template they are based on, and the number of studies using the objective. To view the studies, then select the 'Display studies using this objective' in the context menu of the objective.

EndpointsTable.general: 列出终点及其所基于的模板，以及使用该终点的研究数量。要从模板创建特定终点，请点击表格右上角的 + 按钮。

TimeframesTable.general: 列出时间范围及其所基于的模板，以及使用该时间范围的研究数量。要从模板创建特定的时间范围，请点击表格右上角的 + 按钮。

StudyPurposeView.general: A statement describing the overall rationale of the study. It describes the contribution of this study to product development, i.e., what knowledge is being contributed from the conduct of this study. Follow the tabs to define objectives, endpoints and estimands (if applicable).
StudyPurposeView.study_objectives: The Study Objective(s) is the question to be answered for the trial
StudyPurposeView.study_endpoints: The outcome variable(s) of interest in the trial. Differences between groups in the outcome variable(s) are believed to be the result of the differing interventions.
StudyPurposeView.study_estimands: An estimand (i.e. “what is to be estimated”) is a precise description of the treatment effect reflecting the clinical question posed by the trial objective. It summarises at a population level what the outcomes would be in the same patients under different treatment conditions being compared, cf.ICH E9 (R1) addendum

StudyObjectivesTable.objective_level: Specifies if the objective is Primary or Secondary. The primary objective(s) is the main question to be answered and drives any statistical planning for the trial (e.g. calculation of the sample size to provide the appropriate power for statistical testing). Secondary objectives are goals of a trial that will provide further information to support the primary objective
StudyObjectivesTable.endpoint_count: Objectives and endpoints are linked together. This shows the number of endpoints linked to the objective
StudyObjectivesTable.objective: 与方案中所述一致的目标文本

StudyObjectiveForm.add_title: The objective can be based on standard templates, selected from other studies, or created from scratch
StudyObjectiveForm.select_mode: Copy a criteria from a previous study
StudyObjectiveForm.template_mode: Objectives made from a pre-defined template. Some objectives contain parameters highlighted with orange text (parameter labels) or green text (parameter values) for which new values can be selected, or the parameter omitted.
StudyObjectiveForm.scratch_mode: Write your own criteria from scratch
StudyObjectiveForm.select_objective_tpl: Copy objective(s) from the list of templates using the copy icon and press Continue
StudyObjectiveForm.select_tpl_parameters_label: Fill in the template by selecting values from the dropdown list. Use the eye-icon to hide a parameter from the objective text
StudyObjectiveForm.select_studies: Select studies (one or more) where objectives should be copied from. It will create a combined list of objectives to choose from
StudyObjectiveForm.study_objective: Copy objective(s) from the list of study objectives using the copy icon and press Save.
StudyObjectiveForm.objective_level: 根据方案规定选择该目标是主要还是次要
StudyObjectiveForm.step_edit_title: For template-based objective change the parameter(s) using the drop-down list

StudyEndpointsTable.time_frame: 根据所用特定指标进行测量的时间点。活动时间点的描述必须针对结局指标，并通常表示每位受试者被评估的具体时间段（而非整个研究的持续时间）

StudyEndpointForm.template_mode: 基于预定义模板生成终点。某些终点包含以橙色文本（参数标签）或绿色文本（参数值）突出显示的参数，可选择新值或省略该参数。
StudyEndpointForm.select_objective_title: 选择此终点应关联的目标
StudyEndpointForm.step2_title: 使用复制图标从模板列表中复制终点，并点击“继续”
StudyEndpointForm.timeframe_template: 测量针对特定指标进行评估的时间点。请从下拉列表中选择时间范围模板
StudyEndpointForm.step3_title: 通过从下拉列表中选择参数来完成终点
StudyEndpointForm.endpoint_level: 主要：方案中规定的最重要终点，通常用于统计效能计算。大多数临床研究只有一个主要终点，但也可能有多个。次要：重要性低于主要终点，但作为预先指定分析计划的一部分，用于评估研究中干预措施的影响，并且未被指定为探索性终点。临床研究可能有多个次要终点。探索性：计划中的终点，但更具探索性质。附加：除事后终点外的其他终点，用于评估干预措施或（对观察性研究而言）研究关注的其他方面。

ActivitiesView.general: 研究活动页面用于指定在研究各访视中需要实施、测量或收集的内容
ActivitiesView.activity_list: 在此标签页为研究添加活动。使用 + 按钮添加活动
ActivitiesView.detailed_flowchart: 添加活动后，前往详细 SoA 选择活动发生的访视
ActivitiesView.protocol_flowchart: 显示协议中的 SoA 渲染效果
ActivitiesView.activity_instructions: 用于指定活动说明的标签，例如随机化后次日需给药

StudyActivity.general: “研究活动”是在临床研究中对受试者执行的评估或程序。“研究活动”菜单是管理/选择研究所需活动并对其分组、分配到相关访视，以及在方案视图的活动安排表（SoA）中设置显示方式的地方。您还可以为 SoA 添加脚注、控制 SoA 标题行并预览不同详细程度的 SoA。
StudyActivity.settings: The 'Settings' option allow you to control the time unit (days/weeks) for the SoA and whether or not you need baseline visit (eg. randomisation) shown as time 0
StudyActivity.study_activities: The activities can be selected from the library, from other studies or activity placeholders can be created for requesting new activities.
StudyActivity.detailed_soa:
详细 SoA 用于定义某项活动需要在哪些访视执行。SoA 共有四个层级：
1）SoA 组
2）活动组
3）活动子组
4）活动
点击圆圈可选择或取消某访视的活动。点击眼睛图标可在方案 SoA 中切换某活动层级的可见性。如果某一层级被隐藏，所勾选的时间点会“向上继承”，因此您可以隐藏活动和活动子组层级，仅在方案 SoA 中包含活动组（例如您可能希望隐藏“身高”和“体重”，仅在方案 SoA 中显示“身体测量”）。
StudyActivity.detailed_soa_actions:
Use the ellipsis (three dots) to the left of an activity to access these:
Edit Activity: Adjust details in an activity.
Add Activity: Add an activity above the selected activity (you can change the order of activities from the 'Study Activities' tab).
Exchange Activity: Replace an activity with a new activity while keeping visits and footnotes in the detailed SoA.
Remove Activity: Remove the activity, any visits and references to footnotes that have been added to this activity. A removed activity can be added again under the ‘Study Activities’ tab. Footnotes will not be removed, so can be linked to again.
StudyActivity.detailed_soa_reordering: You can use drag-and-drop for easy reordering of rows in the detailed SoA. To enable, click the 3 dots to the left of a row title and select 'Reorder' in the menu. Now you can reorder rows using your mouse - simply drag-and-drop on the arrow-icon to the left of the row. Reordering is done within a context - so if you select 'Reorder' on a SoA group, then you can reorder only SoA groups, whereas if you select 'Reorder' on an activity, then you can reorder only within that group. When you are done, click the 'Finish reordering' button to exit the reordering mode.
StudyActivity.study_footnotes: 选择或创建用于方案 SoA 的脚注。脚注可以从库、其他研究中选择或从头创建。脚注将在 SoA 中按出现顺序自动排序。
StudyActivity.hidden_activity_footnotes: 如果您链接到被隐藏的活动，脚注不会“向上继承”到上方可见层级。相反，“链接到”下会显示警告，必须处理以确保脚注在方案 SoA 中正确显示。
StudyActivity.protocol_soa: 方案 SoA 是“详细 SoA”部分设置/选择的预览。该视图将通过 Word 外接程序导入方案模板。您还可以在详细和数据规范的操作层级预览 SoA。
StudyActivity.instructions: 注意：此功能尚未启用。启用后，它会将 SoA 中选择的活动链接到方案第 8 章“研究评估和程序”的相关说明文本

StudyActivityForm.general: Select the activities for the study.
StudyActivityForm.select_from_studies: Select activities from a previous study
StudyActivityForm.select_from_library: Select from predefined activities in the library
StudyActivityForm.create_placeholder: Create a placeholder (if activity doesn't exists in library. Should be requested as new activity)
StudyActivityForm.select_studies: Select studies from where you want to copy activities. Press 'CONTINUE' and copy activities as needed using the copy icon
StudyActivityForm.flowchart_group: Template and Placeholder: Specify the high level SoA group the activity should belong to
StudyActivityForm.copy_activity_instructions: Select the activities to copy using the copy icon. Press SAVE. NOTE: if search or filtering has been applied then the copy symbol on the table header (next to Activity Group) will copy all displayed activities.

StudyActivityBatchEditForm.general: Select the visits where the activities are to be collected.

ProtocolFlowchart.update_flowchart: 点击“更新 SoA”以查看方案 SoA 的呈现。按按钮可查看在详细 SoA 视图中所做的更改
ProtocolFlowchart.download_docx: Press DOWNLOAD DOCX to download the WORD version of the SoA

StudyActivityInstructionBatchForm.general: To add an instruction to the activities selected, then add from a study, from a template or from scratch

StudyActivityEditForm.general:
Adjust details in a specific activity here.
It is only possible to change to another value if this is already defined in the library (e.g. HbA1c is allowed in both Efficacy and Safety).
StudyActivityEditForm.drafted_general:
Adjust details in a specific placeholder activity here.
It is only possible to change the content if the placeholder has not been submitted for approval.
StudyActivityEditForm.flowchart_group: Select the SoA group the activity/activities should be assigned to

StudyStatus.core_attributes_body:
Specification of the core attributes for a study, being relationship to clinical programme and project, study number (will be linked to the Study ID) and the Study Acronym.

When a study have not yet been locked it can be deleted from this page, this will be a soft delete and the study will be listed under Deleted studies on the Study List menu.
Note the history displayed from this page is actually the overall history for the study definition.
StudyStatus.content_line_1: A study definition instance can have the following status:
StudyStatus.content_line_2: Draft, refer to the current instance that can be edited.
StudyStatus.content_line_3: Released, refer to a minor version of a stable instance (snapshot) for downstream testing and review.
StudyStatus.content_line_4: Locked, refer to a major version of a stable instance (snapshot) for downstream usage in final deliverables. As this is a major version several constraint checks must be fulfilled for a study definition instance can be locked. Both a locked version instance and a released instance is made when the study is locked to avoid the latest released is older than the latest locked.
StudyStatus.content_line_5: The page will list the available study definition instances and their status.
StudyStatus.content_line_6: The possible actions depend on the current state and status of the study.
StudyStatus.content_line_7: When study is in Draft status the Release action is enabled
StudyStatus.content_line_8:
The possible actions depend on the current state and status of the study.
This will create a stable persistent study instance that can be referred to for downstream usage, as a data snapshot reference in the repository.
A concurrent minor version number will automatically be assigned (0.1, 0.2, …, 1.1, 1.2, …).
The study will continue to be in ‘Draft’ status.
Release is like check-in in a document management system or a commit and push in a Git repository.
StudyStatus.content_line_9: When study is in Draft status the Lock action is enabled
StudyStatus.content_line_10:
This will create a versioned stable persistent study instance that can be referred to from downstream usage, as a data snapshot reference in the repository. The study will change status to ‘Locked’ and can no longer be edited. To continue to edit, an un-lock action must be done starting up a new version.
A concurrent major version number will automatically be assigned (1.0, 2.0, 3.0, …).
The locking process will also make a study release instance to ensure the latest release instance never is older than the latest locked instance.
Lock and Release is like creating a final approved version in a document management system or a merging a pull request into main in a Git repository.
StudyStatus.content_line_11: When study is in Locked status the Un-lock action is enabled
StudyStatus.content_line_12: This will bring the study back into the ‘Draft’ status where the study again can be edited.
StudyStatus.study_sub_parts_body: 将研究定义指定为多个子研究定义的父定义，或作为父定义下的子研究定义的规范。这是针对包含多个子研究部分的方案制定研究规范的方法。
StudyStatus.protocol_version_body: 研究定义实例版本与相应方案文档版本之间关系的说明。

FootnotesTemplatesTable.general: Select from the table of templates. Either from generic templates or pre-specified templates, by using the 'Select from pre-instance'-slide in the top of the table.

FootnotesTable.general: List of footnotes applicable for the Schedule of Activities (SoA).
FootnotesTable.covered_items: The itmes in the SoA that the footnote is related to, e.g. a visits or an Activity.

StudyFootnoteForm.general: 脚注是与SoA元素相关的补充信息。与活动相关的说明应使用“活动说明”选项卡。
StudyFootnoteForm.creation_mode_label: 选择创建脚注的方法：使用标准、从现有研究中选择或从头创建。

ProjectForm.general: 向临床计划添加一个新项目。
ProjectForm.name: 新项目的名称，例如：'演示项目'。
ProjectForm.project_number: 新项目的项目 ID，例如：'AB1234'。
ProjectForm.description: 项目的描述，例如：'用于演示的项目'。

UsdmPage.general: 此页面显示基于 Digital Data Flow (DDF) CDISC/TransCelerate Unified Study Definitions Model (USDM) 生成的 JSON 文件。此处的数据依据 StudyBuilder 团队定义的映射规则提取并转换为 USDM 模型，请注意。
UsdmPage.official_protocol_title: 协议的正式描述性名称。
UsdmPage.clinical_study_def: 临床研究涉及使用人类志愿者（也称为参与者）的研究，旨在增加医学知识。临床研究主要有两种类型：临床试验（也称为干预性研究）和观察性研究。 [[http://ClinicalTrials.gov]](CDISC Glossary)
UsdmPage.study_protocol_version: 在特定时间点为正式调查制定的计划，以评估特定治疗、程序、药物、设备、生物制品、食品、化妆品、护理计划或受试者特征的效用、影响以及药理、生理和/或心理效应。(BRIDG)
UsdmPage.protocol_status: 协议在某一时间点相对于其实施准备状态的情况。参见 [C188723-CDISC DDF Protocol Status Value Set Terminology]
UsdmPage.study_design: 详细说明如何开展研究以描述所考察的现象、回答研究问题并为统计方法提供信息的计划。
UsdmPage.organization_type: 对为实现共同目的（如行政、法律、政治）而聚集在一起的正式人员或其他组织的表征或分类，以及为实现该目的而设立的基础设施。参见 [C188724-CDISC DDF Organization Type Value Set Terminology]
UsdmPage.trial_type: 收集信息的干预性研究的性质。参见 [C66739-CDISC SDTM Trial Type Terminology]
UsdmPage.intervention_model_type: 为临床研究中将干预措施分配给参与者而制定的总体策略设计（clinicaltrials.gov）。参见 [C99076-CDISC SDTM Intervention Model Terminology]
UsdmPage.therapeutic_areas: 根据共同特征对疾病、障碍或其他情况进行分类，并且通常与专注于研究和开发特定治疗干预措施以进行治疗和预防的医学专业相关。
UsdmPage.trial_blinding_schema: 用于描述研究对象和/或研究人员对所观察、接收或施行的干预或评估的知晓程度的试验设计类型。参见 [C66735-CDISC SDTM Trial Blinding Schema Terminology]
UsdmPage.target_study_population: 总体中可推广研究结果的目标人群。

StudyStructuresOverview.general: The Study Structures page is intended to assist Standards Developers by offering an overview of how existing trials have been defined. It allows users to view the study structures they can replicate, identify trends, and spot any deviations. The Study Structures page aims to increase consistency when setting up new trials. Note that studies that share the same structure are grouped together and listed in the table under the same row. The columns display numeric values indicating the number of arms/epochs/elements in the trial or Y/N to indicate if cohorts are part of the trial design.

ActivityInstanceForm.general: An activity instance is the data collection specification of an activity to be used to link the operational SoA with data collection instruments such as CRFs and external data specifications. The activity instance carries metadata for SDTM generation and links to ADaM through PARAM and PARAMCD.
ActivityInstanceForm.step1_description: Search for an activity to add an instance to. If more than one grouping exists make sure to choose the relevant one. If no relevant activity is present then cancel this flow and create a new activity.
ActivityInstanceForm.step2_description: Select an activity instance class and a data domain. These selections will determine the required and optional metadata to be defined for SDTM
ActivityInstanceForm.step3_description: Specify additional details to be used for the generation of PARAM and PARAMCD. The selection of values will autogenerate a suggestion for a unique name for the activity instance, PARAMCD and topic code. Its possible to manually modify the names.
ActivityInstanceForm.step4_description: Specify optional activity items that are not part of PARAM/PARAMCD but will be in SDTM. These values are used to specify data that can be collected on a CRF or a external specification. Examples are methods, anatomical locations or evaluator information that will increase the value of secondary use of data.

Library.dashboard_description: A simple graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of the metadata stored in the Library
Library.codelist_description: Find the CDISC controlled terminology, including the code lists, the valid values and associated definitions for each code list and the evolution in packages and terms over time. Sponsor defined list and terms are also included.
Library.dictionaries_description: Find relevant external dictionaries and thesaurus for clinical development such as SNOMED, MedDRA, MED-RT, UNII, LOINC, UCUM. Since some of these dictionaries are very large, only selected terms relevant for the Novo Nordisk pipeline are included.
Library.concepts_description: Find controlled listings of the terms to use for generic concepts such as units, activities, compounds and CRFs.
Library.syntax_templates_description: View (or manage) the different syntax templates used for specifying the objectives, the endpoints, the eligibility, randomisation, dosing and other criteria for the individual studies. Only templates in status Final can be used under Studies.
Library.template_instantiations_description: See how the different templates are used in the studies, including number of studies using a specific syntax and which studies.
Library.template_collections_description: Find relevant template collections for project templates, shared templates and supporting templates.
Library.data_exchange_standards_description: See the complete master model for the following CDISC data exchange standards: CDASH, SDTM and ADaM.
Library.list_description: Find listings of all codes list and terms for controlled terminology, dictionaries, concepts as well as the data exchange standards, in both new and legacy format.
Library.process_overview_description: Find schematic overviews of the activities covered under the Library. You can use these to navigate to the relevant pages to enter or look up information.

Studies.description_bottom: 并定义所有结构化的研究设计元素
Studies.manage_description: 在应用程序中注册新研究并管理其生命周期。
Studies.dashboard_description: 示例文本：Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud
Studies.define_description: 通过使用受控术语和语法模板或重用其他研究的内容，指定设计、干预措施、研究人群、目标、访视结构、活动计划等。
Studies.build_description: 预览研究信息（例如在“定义研究”下输入的信息），并将其编译用于不同的下游用途，例如导入到方案模板、上传到外部注册机构、填充 SDTM 研究设计数据集、CRF 设计等。
Studies.list_description: 对为您的研究定义的研究规范数据进行各种列出。
Studies.process_overview_description: 查找“研究”下活动的示意图。您可以使用这些图导航到相关页面以录入或查询信息。

StudyStructureCopyForm.arms_help: A study arm specifies a specific intervention, combination of interventions or no treatment/intervention.
StudyStructureCopyForm.branches_help: A Branch is a subset of an Arm where patients are typically split based on indication, dosing, or another parameter.
StudyStructureCopyForm.cohorts_help: A cohort is a group of participants, who share a common characteristic (sex, disease etc) or an intervention (specific dose, device etc) within the study
StudyStructureCopyForm.elements_help: An Element is used to specify the intended purpose within an Arm or an Epoch.
StudyStructureCopyForm.epochs_help: An Epoch describes a time period in the study such as dose escalation of the drug. An Epoch can have a footnote attached which would be visible in the Schedule of Activities.
StudyStructureCopyForm.visits_help: A Study visit is a single point in time during the study where an activity is happening. A Study visit can have a footnote attached which would be visible in the Schedule of Activities.
StudyStructureCopyForm.design_matrix_help: The design matrix combines the overall interventions (Study Elements) that a subject will undergo while participating in a study arm over time (Study Epochs).

ActivityInstanceForm.step1_long_title: 选择要添加活动实例的活动
ActivityInstanceForm.step1_help: 当选择属于多个分组的活动时，请确保选择正确的分组。确保要创建的活动实例在相同分组下不存在；否则可为活动实例添加新的分组。
ActivityInstanceForm.step3_long_title: 用于 PARAM/PARAMCD 的可选活动条目类别

ActivityInstanceForm.step4_help: 如果只选择一个值，则该值将作为默认值；若选择多个值，则数据收集工具中会提供选项。
ActivityInstanceForm.required_for_activity_help: 此标记用于标准治理过程。当选择某活动时，如果其某些或所有实例必须选择，可使用此标记，例如问卷。
ActivityInstanceForm.data_sharing_help: 此标记用于允许将实例详情与 CDISC 和其他制药公司共享。包含诺和诺德特定信息的活动实例不应勾选此标记，例如产品信息或特定抗体等。
ActivityInstanceForm.default_selected_help: 默认标记帮助用户更快地选择实例，在所有研究中使用最多的实例会被标记为默认。仅当活动下存在多个实例时使用。用户可根据研究需要手动更改选择。
ActivityInstanceForm.data_from_research_lab: 来自研究实验室的数据
ActivityInstanceForm.data_from_research_lab_help: 该标记表示数据采集基于研究实验室，可能未完全满足所有 GxP 要求，因此这些数据不能用于终点分析。
